/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, their colors muted under the bright sunlight.

On either side of the street, buildings rise up, their facades a mix of architectural styles. Some are modern, their glass and steel structures reflecting the sunlight, while others hark back to older eras, their brick and concrete facades adding a touch of history to the scene.

Trees line the street, their leaves a lush green against the urban backdrop. They provide pockets of shade, offering respite from the sun's rays. Streetlights stand sentinel along the road, their lights off in the daylight but ready to illuminate the scene as dusk falls.

The image is taken from a high vantage point, offering a bird's eye view of the street below. This perspective allows for a comprehensive view of the scene, capturing the rhythm of city life in all its vibrant detail. The image is a snapshot of urban life, a moment frozen in time amidst the constant motion of the city.
